page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There is little industry in survey area & many commute to neighbouring towns or the{C.E.G.B. Power Station, some 2 miles outside the area. Within area are{2 limestone quarries} providing stone for roads & gardens & fine dust for soil dressing. Lorries & drivers for the quarries come mainly from outside the area. An old war time ammunition compound provided an oil storage depot which is now a{fertilizer store.} { Farming}provides employment for small numbers of people,today usually within the family owning the farm. Other large employers are the{ {Hospital}and a large comprehensive{ {school.}Others are occupied in{service {industries}eg. shops, pubs, tourism. The latter includes the local{coach {firm}which employs drivers full & part time and a cleaner.
